pullRequest.title: [miio] Allow for quantity Type
pullRequest.bodyText:
e.g. use number:temperature
readonly temperature tested.
note: needs further testing on dimensionless and handle command
Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen marcel@verpaalen.com

beforeCommit.message:
miio fix strange compiling error

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

commit.message:
[miio] Allow for quantity Type in the basic handler

This extends the miio:basic handler with the option to define channels
with QuantityType e.g. to use number:temperature

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

afterCommit.message:
[miio] Allow for quantity Type in the basic handler

This extends the miio:basic handler with the option to define channels
with QuantityType e.g. to use number:temperature
